kohoma hari wadeta mu rupiyal 50000 k aragena.passe ithali yanna bottuwata geniyana gaman thama mun ara kollawa aragena gihin thiyenne me gamanata chandanayath gihin thusharaya ekka,kohomahari mun ara kollawa ara palu hariyata geniyala ,me palu hariya ganja karayo,kudu karayo pawichchi karana thanak.ehema yaddi thusharaya bag eke kabayak dagena gihin thiyenne.mu passen ekaparatama ara kollage bellata kabe dala chandanayath ekka ekathu wela bella hira karala marala dala,ee kale assema dala himinma maru wela, chandanayata ee welawe 3000 dila,thusharaya eka paratama athurudan wela, porage plan ekata pora ithaliyatama gihin.ohoma yaddi thama chandanaya me kathawa muge katin pitawela thiyenne game kollanta.mu meka kiyala adala thiyanawa than than wala.passe me kollo meka polisiyata kiyala mehema ekek minimarumak gana kiyala adanawa kiyala.passe thama chandanayawa geniyala me minimaruma hoyagaththe,,eeth ee welawe atakatu kipayak witharayi thibune mokada ganwathura,kabarayo kala miniya dapu thanin godak athata gihin, polisiya amaruwen eeka hoya gaththe chandanaya pennapu thanin.

uda : ayuthu labhaya (rajya aayathanawalata sidukala paduwa) hatiyata ru. 8,529,964,495.61 × 2 = ru. 17,059,928,991.22 dandanayada sahithawa 2015.02.27 wana dina awidhimath bandumkara nikuthuwa nisa athi wu kshanika paduwa ru. 688,762,100.00 × 2 = ru. 1,377,524,200.00 me anuwa parpechuwal te්rasaris samagamen pamanak aya wiya yuthu awama mudala = biliyana 18.437 ki.

ema madhya hamuwa sandaha janatha wimukthi peramune deshapalana mandala sabhika ke.di. lalkantha mahatha, maruthaye handa sanwidhanaye widarshana kannangara mahatha, lanka welanda sangamaye sunesh jayakodi mahatha, sadacharathmaka deshapalana sanskruthiyak wenuwen kanthawo sanwidhanaye subha wijesiriwardhana mahathmiya, wame kendraye mahinda rathnayaka mahatha, shri lanka widyarthayinge ha wruththikayinge sanwidhanaye gunasena dahanayaka mahatha, samastha lanka tharuna hindu sammelanaye aacharya sathis kumar siwalingam mahatha, si.di.aar sanwidhanaye ikram nasir mahatha, prajathanthrawadaya sandaha samanallu sanwidhanaye kathikacharya thyagaraja waradas mahatha, wiplawiya samajawadi kendraye wasantha disanayaka mahatha, didulana hadawatha sanwidhanaye githa rachaka rawi siriwardhana mahatha, 52 wyaparaye hemamali wijesinha mahatha, jathika widwath sanwidhanaye aacharya anura karunathilaka mahatha, yahapath samajayak wenuwen lekhaka lekhikawo sanwidhanaye sahithyewdi kirthi walisarage mahatha, 71 sahodarathwa sansadaye yu.aar perera mahatha, aluth parapura sanwidhanaye ranganashilpi jagath manuwarna mahatha saha sangithawedi sudantha madhawa yana mahathwaru ema madhya hamuwedi adahas dakwuha.
